message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of navigation in an indoor environment using audio and visual sensory data. This falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO) as the agent is required to plan a sequence of actions to achieve its goal. The paper also involves computer vision (cs.CV) as it uses visual perception to construct a spatial memory of the environment. Additionally, the paper involves machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as the agent is required to learn from various modalities and plan a sequence of actions based on observations. Finally, the paper involves signal processing (cs.SD) as it deals with inferring the relative location of the sound source from the agent.
